title: Daily Defense Invisible Sunscreen Super Serum SPF 60

attributes.What it is:
Protect your skin with Saeed Ghani Sunscreen Super Serum SPF 60—a lightweight, invisible formula infused with Vitamin C and E for ultimate daily defense.
Our zero white cast Sunscreen Serum shields against UVA & UVB rays, fights free radicals and helps brighten and nourish your skin, giving you a radiant, healthy glow. Its fast-absorbing, non-greasy texture makes it perfect for daily use. The antioxidant-rich formula helps repair sun damage while keeping your skin hydrated. Get all-day sun protection with a smooth, breathable finish.
30ml
attributes.How to use:
•
Shake well before use.
•
Apply 2-3 drops onto clean, dry skin.
•
Gently massage until fully absorbed.
•
Reapply every 2-3 hours for continuous protection.
•
Use daily as the last step in your skincare routine.
attributes.Benefits:
•
Broad-spectrum SPF 60 – Protects against UVA & UVB damage
•
Infused with Vitamin C & E – Brightens & nourishes skin
•
Lightweight & Invisible – No white cast, absorbs instantly
•
Hydrates & Soothes – Keeps skin fresh and smooth
•
Prevents Premature Aging – Reduces fine lines & sun damage
attributes.ingredients: Aqua, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Homosalate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Avobenzone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glyceryl Stearate, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Stearic Acid, Polysorbate 28, Titanium Dioxide, Aluminum Hydroxide, Stearic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, and Butylated Hydroxytoluene.

attributes.What it is:
Experience powerful sun protection with the added glow-boosting benefits of Vitamin C. Our Vitamin C Sunblock SPF 60 shields your skin from harmful UVA & UVB rays while brightening and revitalizing your complexion. Infused with antioxidants, it helps reduce dark spots, prevents sun damage, and promotes an even skin tone. This lightweight, non-greasy formula blends effortlessly into the skin, leaving it hydrated, radiant, and protected all day with zero white cast. Suitable for all skin types and perfect for daily use.
• Broad-spectrum SPF 60 protection
• Enriched with Vitamin C for a healthy glow
• Fights pigmentation and sun-induced aging
• Lightweight & easily absorbable
• Keeps skin fresh, soft, and nourished
(60ml) (100ml)
attributes.Directions:
•
Wash your face with a gentle cleanser and pat dry.
•
If you use serum or moisturizer, apply them first and let them absorb fully.
•
Take a generous amount of Vitamin C Sunblock SPF 60 and apply it evenly to your face, neck, and exposed areas.
•
Reapply every 2-3 hours, especially if sweating or after washing your face.
attributes.Caution: For external use only. Not to be swallowed. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear.
attributes.Ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua, Polyglyceryl-3 stearate, Isopropyl myristate, Caprylic triglyceride, Glyceryl stearate, Glycerine, Titanium dioxide, Sodium ascorbyl phosphate (Vitamin C), Ethylhexylglycerin, Vitamin E.

title: Oil-Free Tinted Sunscreen With Niacinamide Serum

attributes.What it is:
Elevate your daily glow with our Oil-Free Tinted Sunscreen. Lightweight sun protection meets niacinamide's transformative touch for a radiant, confident you.
This lightweight, non-greasy formula not only shields your skin from harmful UV rays but also delivers the added benefits of niacinamide. Revel in the perfect fusion of a breathable tint that effortlessly evens out your skin tone while the potent niacinamide works to enhance skin texture, minimize pores, and promote a radiant complexion. Our Oil-Free Tinted Sunscreen with Niacinamide Serum is your daily essential for a flawless, protected, and naturally beautiful glow.
(30ml)
attributes.Directions: Apply liberally & evenly on face and exposed parts of the body (neck, arms, legs Etc.) 15-30 minutes before sun exposure. Re-apply frequently.

Need a quick solution for fresh skin? Saeed Ghani organic rose water spray is just what you need. Made from fresh natural roses, our pure rose water is the perfect solution to help your skin fight pollution every day. It can help balance the natural oil that your skin produces and hydrate your skin to give you that young glow. Regular usage of our rose water for skin can help prevent wrinkles and fine lines.
(120ml)
Uses of rose water for glowing skin:
• Skin toner
• Acne fighter
• Pore cleanser
• Natural Makeup remover
• Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
• To reduce under-eye puffiness & keep the skin hydrated
The easy spray solution is perfect to help you take care of your skin on the go. Just take out the bottle and spray it on your face to unclog all the pores and purify your face of any bacteria.
For all skin types
attributes.BENEFITS:
Rose water as a Skin toner
Pure rose water is gentle in nature and helps in maintaining the skin's pH balance. It also possesses astringent properties which helps clean the pores of oil and grime toning the skin further. Regular use of rose water will keep the skin free of extra oil and help prevent problems like blackheads, whiteheads, acne and pimple. Using rose water as toner is better than using chemical-based toners which might dry out the skin.
Rose water has soothing properties and can be used as an all-natural skin toner. Apply rose water on your face and allow it to settle in your pores. Your face will feel fresh and the lingering rose aroma will uplift your mood.
Rose Water To reduce under-eye puffiness
Rose water helps to hydrate, revitalise and moisturise the skin giving it a refreshed look. Also, it has anti-inflammatory property which reduces redness in the skin. The gentle rose water can be used on the sensitive under-eye area without any worry. Puffy eyes will immediately perk up and look rejuvenated with a spray of rose water.
If your eyes are tired or puffy from lack of sleep, rose water offers a simple solution. Take a chill bottle of rose water (place the fridge for a while). Soak cotton pads in it and gently place on your eyelids. Keep on for as long as you want while enjoying the soothing feeling around your eyes. It will help reduce puffiness and give relief to tired eyes instantly.
Rose Water as Natural Makeup Remover
The soothing properties of rose water make it a gentle makeup remover for all skin types. When mixed with a natural oil, it can dissolve most of the makeup without being harsh on the skin. The skin will feel fresh and hydrated later and the sweet fragrance is an added advantage.
Rose water can help you get off that makeup in a gentle way. Mix 2 tsp of rose water with 1 tsp of coconut or almond oil to create an effective, natural makeup remover that will dissolve the most stubborn make-up with great care. Dip a cotton swab in this concoction and wipe away the layer of makeup and grime. Both rose water and coconut oil are good for skin and it is safe for removing eye makeup as well.
Rose Water as Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
Keeping rose water handy in your bag can help you wipe off the sweat and dirt accumulated on the face while on the go. The best part is that it can be used in all seasons as it’s gentle on the skin and even hydrating. A quick spray of rose water on the face or sweaty skin will refresh it immediately and can be used as many times as required without worrying about the side effects or dryness in the skin.
A spritz of rose water on your face after a long day can be quite refreshing. It can also be used to set make-up and give a dewy finish.
Rose Water Hydrating the skin
One of the amazing benefits of rose water is that it can add a burst of moisture to the skin. The skin will feel cool, soft and soothed instantly. You can use it directly or mix rose water in your face mask, cream or lotion to add an extra dose of moisturisation to the skin.
Rose water gives a healthy glow to the skin and is good for boosting hydration. Mix a small amount of rose water in your moisturising cream and apply it on your face for a refreshing feel. The moisturiser will get easily absorbed in the skin hydrating it from within.
attributes.Ingredients: Rose Damascena, Glycerin, Aqua

Ubtan is a traditional herbal paste that’s made by mixing many essential ingredients including milk, gram flour, turmeric, Multani mud, and rose water in certain quantities.
Owing to the natural ingredients used in ubtan, we suggest you make it a permanent addition to your skincare routine.
Ubtan powder is conducive to younger, smoother skin. It helps in tightening up pores, removing dark circles, acne, and wrinkles. (100gm)
attributes.Benefits:
An ubtan mask will get you the glow
Ubtan is a natural face mask and unlike other masks, it’s filled with loads of natural ingredients and goodness. When used twice or thrice a week consistently, it leaves the skin feeling clean and hydrated. As a result, you will get smooth skin. The milk used in the mask helps to lighten the dark spots on the skin that gives your skin a glow you have never experienced before.
Gives a flawless skin
Ubtan gives you a clear and flawless skin that you have always desired. Ubtan is your problem solver if you suffer from skin issues such as acne and pigmentation.
Anti-aging effect
Turmeric is famously known for its anti-inflammatory and anti-aging properties. All these properties make the skin appear youthful and bright. It is useful in treating flaky-dry skin, which is a big sign of aging.
Removes facial hair
Forget the artificial wax. A gentle facial scrub with Ubtan can help remove facial hair safely and gently.
Gives You Toned Skin
Multani mud powder is known to be amazing for your skin. It helps tighten and close your skin pores and simultaneously give you a youthful glow that makes you look younger.

attributes.WHAT IS IT:
Need a quick solution for fresh skin? Saeed Ghani organic rose water spray is just what you need. Made from fresh natural roses, our pure rose water is the perfect solution to help your skin fight pollution every day. It can help balance the natural oil that your skin produces and hydrate your skin to give you that young glow. Regular usage of our rose water for skin can help prevent wrinkles and fine lines.
(120ml)
Uses of rose water for glowing skin:
• Skin toner
• Acne fighter
• Pore cleanser
• Natural Makeup remover
• Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
• To reduce under-eye puffiness & keep the skin hydrated
The easy spray solution is perfect to help you take care of your skin on the go. Just take out the bottle and spray it on your face to unclog all the pores and purify your face of any bacteria.
For all skin types
attributes.BENEFITS:
Rose water as a Skin toner
Pure rose water is gentle in nature and helps in maintaining the skin's pH balance. It also possesses astringent properties which helps clean the pores of oil and grime toning the skin further. Regular use of rose water will keep the skin free of extra oil and help prevent problems like blackheads, whiteheads, acne and pimple. Using rose water as toner is better than using chemical-based toners which might dry out the skin.
Rose water has soothing properties and can be used as an all-natural skin toner. Apply rose water on your face and allow it to settle in your pores. Your face will feel fresh and the lingering rose aroma will uplift your mood.
Rose Water To reduce under-eye puffiness
Rose water helps to hydrate, revitalise and moisturise the skin giving it a refreshed look. Also, it has anti-inflammatory property which reduces redness in the skin. The gentle rose water can be used on the sensitive under-eye area without any worry. Puffy eyes will immediately perk up and look rejuvenated with a spray of rose water.
If your eyes are tired or puffy from lack of sleep, rose water offers a simple solution. Take a chill bottle of rose water (place the fridge for a while). Soak cotton pads in it and gently place on your eyelids. Keep on for as long as you want while enjoying the soothing feeling around your eyes. It will help reduce puffiness and give relief to tired eyes instantly.
Rose Water as Natural Makeup Remover
The soothing properties of rose water make it a gentle makeup remover for all skin types. When mixed with a natural oil, it can dissolve most of the makeup without being harsh on the skin. The skin will feel fresh and hydrated later and the sweet fragrance is an added advantage.
Rose water can help you get off that makeup in a gentle way. Mix 2 tsp of rose water with 1 tsp of coconut or almond oil to create an effective, natural makeup remover that will dissolve the most stubborn make-up with great care. Dip a cotton swab in this concoction and wipe away the layer of makeup and grime. Both rose water and coconut oil are good for skin and it is safe for removing eye makeup as well.
Rose Water as Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
Keeping rose water handy in your bag can help you wipe off the sweat and dirt accumulated on the face while on the go. The best part is that it can be used in all seasons as it’s gentle on the skin and even hydrating. A quick spray of rose water on the face or sweaty skin will refresh it immediately and can be used as many times as required without worrying about the side effects or dryness in the skin.
A spritz of rose water on your face after a long day can be quite refreshing. It can also be used to set make-up and give a dewy finish.
Rose Water Hydrating the skin
One of the amazing benefits of rose water is that it can add a burst of moisture to the skin. The skin will feel cool, soft and soothed instantly. You can use it directly or mix rose water in your face mask, cream or lotion to add an extra dose of moisturisation to the skin.
Rose water gives a healthy glow to the skin and is good for boosting hydration. Mix a small amount of rose water in your moisturising cream and apply it on your face for a refreshing feel. The moisturiser will get easily absorbed in the skin hydrating it from within.
attributes.Ingredients: Rose Damascena, Glycerin, Aqua

attributes.How to use:
How to use:
Pump out a generous quantity of the oil depending on your hair volume and length. Gently massage onto scalp focusing on the roots, then work it through the length of your hair. Leave on for at-least half an hour before shampooing. For better results keep it overnight.

title: Mughziat Hair Oil
description:
Mughziat Oil is one of the best-blended oils by Saeed Ghani. It is formulated with various natural ingredients, which nourishes your scalp & hair for stronger, thicker and shinier hair.
Saeed Ghani has combined its powerful ancestral oil recipe with the benefits of several natural oils including mineral oil, neem oil, castor oil, clove oil, olive oil, mustard oil and coconut oil, into one powerful Mughziat oil for an effective hair repair solution.
With its potent formula, Mughziat hair oil drastically reduces hair fall as it strengthens & thickens your hair. At the same time, it moisturizes your hair to make them silkier & shinier along with nourishing your scalp with its naturally powerful ingredients. The oil caters to all types of hair and is ideal for use in all seasons.
(100ml)

attributes.Benefits:
Saeed Ghani Mughziat Oil is available in a 100ml bottle and brings you the following benefits:
• Repairs your hair from all previous damage preventing hair fall.
• Moisturizes and nourishes the scalp to spur faster hair growth & prevent hair breakage and damage.
• Reduces dandruff while adding a beautiful shine to your hair.

title: Hair Growth Cream
description:
60ml
Saeed Ghani Hair Growth Cream is a fast absorbing, daily use, non-sticky formula that strengthens hair follicles, prevents hair fall & reduces dandruff.
With the goodness of naturally powerful ingredients, this cream nourishes hair from the roots, boosts scalp health, stimulates hair growth, and increases hair strength. It provides an instant hydration boost to your hair, helping fight dandruff, visibly reducing flakes and soothing the scalp. This non-sticky cream spreads easily and helps you maintain a healthy scalp.

attributes.Benefits:
Helps in preventing hair loss & stimulating hair growth with its nourishing natural ingredients.
Nourishes the scalp and strengthens hair roots making your hair thicker and stronger.
Protects harmful effects of sunrays and pollution.
Cures and prevents dandruff due to its antifungal properties. Prevents early graying of hair and strengthens weak hair.

Eternal Blend is an intricate, majestic fragrance, nothing short of delightful. This unorthodox fragrance then closes off on a stronger note, giving off a scent composed of more masculine tobacco, musk, cedar, and sandalwood notes. At its heart, a rich floral bouquet of Turkish rose, jasmine, and ylang-ylang unfolds, adding depth and femininity. The scent settles into a warm and sensual base of patchouli, white musk, vanilla, vetiver, and tonka bean, leaving behind an unforgettable trail of timeless beauty.
5ml Spray

Glory embodies the spirit of modern elegance, crafted for those who shine with grace and confidence. It opens with a refreshing blend of bright citrus and delicate floral notes, creating an uplifting and feminine aura. At its heart, the fragrance unveils the elegance of rose and jasmine, mingling with a soft hint of peach, evoking a sense of timeless beauty. The fragrance settles into a smooth, powdery base of vanilla and musk, leaving behind a trail of warmth and sophistication. Glory – illuminate your presence with every breath.
5ml Spray

Signature Inpired by Dior Sauvage is an elegant and classy scent that exudes class of a different caliber. It kicks off with a fruity yet spicy combination of Calabrian bergamot and pepper, resulting in a sweet and citrusy, yet a masculine scent. Then, it moves onto a much more intricate scent with minty, flowery, and spicy tones. It's composed of the soft & beautiful notes of vetiver and lavender, alongside the piquant & Picante notes of Sichuan and pink peppers, mixed ingeniously with a gentle, minty and musky scent of geranium, elemi and patchouli.
5ml Spray

Jalal is a fragrance of strength, elegance, and undeniable charisma. It begins with a fresh wave of mandarin orange and invigorating sea notes, capturing the energy of confidence and power. The heart unfolds with a refined blend of black pepper, neroli, and cedarwood, adding warmth and sophistication. As it settles, rich tonka bean, earthy vetiver, and smooth white musk create a bold yet effortless finish.
5ml Spray

Kingdom is a refreshing and sophisticated fragrance. It opens with a zesty burst of Lemon, cool Mint, and a touch of spiciness from Pink Pepper. As it develops, the heart reveals a blend of earthy Vetiver, delicate Jasmine, and warm Ginger. The fragrance settles into a timeless base of Sandalwood, Amber, and Musk, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and allure.
5ml Spray

Ishq is a fragrance of romance and timeless beauty. It opens with a luminous blend of red berries and pear, creating a delicate yet captivating first impression. The heart blooms with the enchanting notes of gardenia, frangipani, and jasmine, adding depth and elegance. As it settles, the warmth of patchouli and brown sugar lingers softly, leaving behind a scent that feels both intimate and unforgettable.
5ml Spray

Our immaculate Intense Passion Inspired by Dunhill Desire encapsulates a subtle, yet sweet and refreshing scent, perfect for the gentleman who radiates energy. opens with a sweet fruity and flowery scent, composed of a beautiful neroli scent, alongside a citrusy touch of bergamot and lemon supplemented with a refreshing apple scent. After that, the fragrance smoothly moves into a gorgeous, more flower-dominant smell consisting of an appealing rosy smell aided perfectly by a fresh smell of patchouli and teak wood.
5ml Spray

Blue is a refreshing fragrance that captures the essence of the ocean breeze and sun-kissed sands. Its lively top notes of citrus and marine accords are balanced by an herbal heart that evokes a sense of adventure. A woody, musky base grounds the fragrance, giving it a crisp, clean finish. Perfect for daytime wear, casual outings, or a seaside getaway, Blue keeps you feeling fresh and effortlessly cool, no matter where your day takes you.
5ml Spray

Saeed Ghani Temptation inspired by CK ONE is a mesmerizing fragrance that embodies elegance and sophistication. With its captivating blend of floral and woody notes, this fragrance leaves a lasting impression that lingers throughout the day. The top notes of bergamot, blackcurrant, and pear create a fruity and fresh opening that is both aromatic and alluring. The heart notes of jasmine, orange blossom, and iris give way to a floral bouquet that exudes elegance and grace. Finally, the base notes of patchouli, vanilla, and praline bring warmth and depth to the fragrance.
5ml Spray

Embrace the perfect harmony of elegance and allure with Sacred, a scent for Women that captivates the senses. It opens with a luscious blend of black currant and pear, creating a fruity and vibrant first impression. At its heart, delicate iris, jasmine, and orange blossom weave a floral symphony that exudes grace and charm. As the scent settles, a warm and indulgent base of praline, vanilla, patchouli, and tonka bean leaves a lasting trail of sophistication and mystery.
5ml Spray

Refined yet daring, Ivory for Women is a fragrance that commands attention with its unique blend of warmth and vibrance. It begins with an enticing fusion of almond, coffee, bergamot, and lemon, creating a rich yet refreshing opening. At its heart, a luxurious bouquet of tuberose, jasmine sambac, orange blossom, and Bulgarian rose unfolds, adding depth and sophistication. The fragrance lingers with a warm and sensual base of vanilla, sandalwood, musk, amber, patchouli, cinnamon, and cedar, leaving an unforgettable impression of timeless elegance.
5ml Spray

The Saeed Ghani Hugo Essence inspired by Hugo boss is a sweet and exquisite experience, that consistently lasts long as well!. Kicking off with a gentle yet prominent mix of fresh and citrusy apple, bergamot, plum and lemon, while simultaneously exuding a soft, more masculine scent of oakmoss and geranium. It then shifts to the minty and spicy tones of cinnamon, mahogany, and carnation. To end the show, this magnificent scent transitions smoothly to a sweet and soft yet strong and classy mix of vanilla, sandalwood, vetiver, cedar and olive tree, resulting in an intricate but simple and subtle end, a perfect note to end on.
5ml Spray

Captivated by the lush beauty of the tropics, Saeed Ghani’s Drizzle transports you to a world of tropical delight. Immerse yourself in the exquisite aroma of sun-kissed pineapples, zesty tangerines, and plump, juicy strawberries. Like a stroll through a fragrant paradise, our scents blend the tropical allure of ripe pineapples, the invigorating tang of tangerines, and the sweet indulgence of succulent strawberries. Every whiff evokes the sensation of basking in the warmth of a tropical paradise, with the sun kissing your skin and the fruits of the island at your fingertips. Explore our collection and let the tropical enchantment embrace your senses.
5ml Spray

Obsession is a bold and confident fragrance crafted for those who embrace life with intensity. It opens with a powerful blend of juicy pineapple, fresh apple, and bergamot, creating an invigorating and memorable first impression. At its heart, birch, jasmine, and patchouli come together to lend depth and sophistication. A base of musk, oakmoss, and vanilla provides a rich, smoky finish that lingers on the skin. Ideal for evenings or special occasions, Obsession embodies a spirit of adventure and charisma.
5ml Spray

title: Aloe Vera Oil-Free Daily Moisturizing Gel
description:
This moisturizing gel, made with aloe vera extract, instantly calms and soothes sensitive, stressed-out skin and keeps it moisturized. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave skin greasy or sticky.
Rich in vitamin A and C, Saeed Ghani Aloe Vera face & body gel, helps fight acne, gives the skin a powerful moisture boost and nourishes it deeply for a naturally beautiful & glowing skin.
Its exfoliating qualities deep cleans the skin and locks in moisture for a smoother, softer & healthier skin.
What's more is that the antioxidants in Aloe Vera also protects your skin from the harmful UV rays, resulting in a silky smooth & brighter skin.
(180gm)

attributes.Benefits:
Saeed Ghani Aloe Vera Gel is available in 180gm packs that can give you the following benefits:
• Help fight skin burn and tan.
• Helps in keeping your skin glowing and healthy.
• Antiseptic qualities can help fight against bacteria on your skin.
• Easy to use without any stickiness.

title: Aloe Vera Soothing & Moisturizing Gel
description: Aloe Vera Moisturizing Gel is an oil-free refreshing & soothing gel that softens and revitalizes chapped dull, sun-exposed, moisture-deprived skin while helping normal skin remain moisture. It provides an instant hydration boost to the skin and absorbs rapidly - leaving your skin smooth & Silky. (100ml)

attributes.Benefits:
• Moisturize and hydrates the skin.
• Helps remove dead skin cells and clear pores.
• Soothes skin irritation, itches, and sun-exposed skin.
• Helps alleviate Strech marks and the appearance fine lines.
• Helps diminish the appearance of dark spots, acne and dark circles.
• Works as a hydrating make-up remover to help remove makeup with ease.
attributes.Directions::
Suitable for all skin types, use Saeed Ghani Aloe Vera Moisturizing Gel for everyday use to help hydrate and soothe your skin. Evenly apply and gently massage into the skin and let it dry for the best results.
Before applying to your skin always do a patch test on a small test area of skin, such as the back of neck or hand. Regular use soothes the skin leaving it soft and supple with a healthy glow.
Caution:
For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation, redness or discomfort occurs, please discontinue use.
attributes.Ingredients: Made with Water, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Gel, Mint, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, and Fragrance

Ubtan is a traditional herbal paste that’s made by mixing many essential ingredients including milk, gram flour, turmeric, Multani mud, and rose water in certain quantities.

Ubtan powder is conducive to younger, smoother skin. It helps in tightening up pores, removing dark circles, acne, and wrinkles.

attributes.Benefits:
An ubtan mask will get you the glow
Ubtan is a natural face mask and unlike other masks, it’s filled with loads of natural ingredients and goodness. When used twice or thrice a week consistently, it leaves the skin feeling clean and hydrated. As a result, you will get smooth skin. The milk used in the mask helps to lighten the dark spots on the skin that gives your skin a glow you have never experienced before.
Gives a flawless skin
Ubtan gives you a clear and flawless skin that you have always desired. Ubtan is your problem solver if you suffer from skin issues such as acne and pigmentation.
Anti-aging effect
Turmeric is famously known for its anti-inflammatory and anti-aging properties. All these properties make the skin appear youthful and bright. It is useful in treating flaky-dry skin, which is a big sign of aging.
Removes facial hair
Forget the artificial wax. A gentle facial scrub with Ubtan can help remove facial hair safely and gently.
Gives You Toned Skin
Multani mud powder is known to be amazing for your skin. It helps tighten and close your skin pores and simultaneously gives you a youthful glow that makes you look younger.

attributes.WHAT IS IT:
Need a quick solution for fresh skin? Saeed Ghani organic rose water spray is just what you need. Made from fresh natural roses, our pure rose water is the perfect solution to help your skin fight pollution every day. It can help balance the natural oil that your skin produces and hydrate your skin to give you that young glow. Regular usage of our rose water for skin can help prevent wrinkles and fine lines.
(120ml)
Uses of rose water for glowing skin:
• Skin toner
• Acne fighter
• Pore cleanser
• Natural Makeup remover
• Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
• To reduce under-eye puffiness & keep the skin hydrated
The easy spray solution is perfect to help you take care of your skin on the go. Just take out the bottle and spray it on your face to unclog all the pores and purify your face of any bacteria.
For all skin types
attributes.BENEFITS:
Rose water as a Skin toner
Pure rose water is gentle in nature and helps in maintaining the skin's pH balance. It also possesses astringent properties which helps clean the pores of oil and grime toning the skin further. Regular use of rose water will keep the skin free of extra oil and help prevent problems like blackheads, whiteheads, acne and pimple. Using rose water as toner is better than using chemical-based toners which might dry out the skin.
Rose water has soothing properties and can be used as an all-natural skin toner. Apply rose water on your face and allow it to settle in your pores. Your face will feel fresh and the lingering rose aroma will uplift your mood.
Rose Water To reduce under-eye puffiness
Rose water helps to hydrate, revitalise and moisturise the skin giving it a refreshed look. Also, it has anti-inflammatory property which reduces redness in the skin. The gentle rose water can be used on the sensitive under-eye area without any worry. Puffy eyes will immediately perk up and look rejuvenated with a spray of rose water.
If your eyes are tired or puffy from lack of sleep, rose water offers a simple solution. Take a chill bottle of rose water (place the fridge for a while). Soak cotton pads in it and gently place on your eyelids. Keep on for as long as you want while enjoying the soothing feeling around your eyes. It will help reduce puffiness and give relief to tired eyes instantly.
Rose Water as Natural Makeup Remover
The soothing properties of rose water make it a gentle makeup remover for all skin types. When mixed with a natural oil, it can dissolve most of the makeup without being harsh on the skin. The skin will feel fresh and hydrated later and the sweet fragrance is an added advantage.
Rose water can help you get off that makeup in a gentle way. Mix 2 tsp of rose water with 1 tsp of coconut or almond oil to create an effective, natural makeup remover that will dissolve the most stubborn make-up with great care. Dip a cotton swab in this concoction and wipe away the layer of makeup and grime. Both rose water and coconut oil are good for skin and it is safe for removing eye makeup as well.
Rose Water as Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
Keeping rose water handy in your bag can help you wipe off the sweat and dirt accumulated on the face while on the go. The best part is that it can be used in all seasons as it’s gentle on the skin and even hydrating. A quick spray of rose water on the face or sweaty skin will refresh it immediately and can be used as many times as required without worrying about the side effects or dryness in the skin.
A spritz of rose water on your face after a long day can be quite refreshing. It can also be used to set make-up and give a dewy finish.
Rose Water Hydrating the skin
One of the amazing benefits of rose water is that it can add a burst of moisture to the skin. The skin will feel cool, soft and soothed instantly. You can use it directly or mix rose water in your face mask, cream or lotion to add an extra dose of moisturisation to the skin.
Rose water gives a healthy glow to the skin and is good for boosting hydration. Mix a small amount of rose water in your moisturising cream and apply it on your face for a refreshing feel. The moisturiser will get easily absorbed in the skin hydrating it from within.

Elevate your daily glow with our Oil-Free Tinted Sunscreen. Lightweight sun protection meets niacinamide's transformative touch for a radiant, confident you.
This lightweight, non-greasy formula not only shields your skin from harmful UV rays but also delivers the added benefits of niacinamide. Revel in the perfect fusion of a breathable tint that effortlessly evens out your skin tone while the potent niacinamide works to enhance skin texture, minimize pores, and promote a radiant complexion. Our Oil-Free Tinted Sunscreen with Niacinamide Serum is your daily essential for a flawless, protected, and naturally beautiful glow.
(30ml)
attributes.Directions: Apply liberally & evenly on face and exposed parts of the body (neck, arms, legs Etc.) 15-30 minutes before sun exposure. Re-apply frequently.
attributes.Caution: For external use only. Not to be swallowed. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear.
attributes.Ingredients: Aqua, Octyl Salicylate, Cetostearyl Alcohol, Titanium Dioxide, Glycerol Monostearate, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Stearic Acid, Zinc Oxide, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Salicylate, Fragrance, Xanthan Gum.

title: Activated Charcoal Detox & Cleanse Face Wash
description:
Deep Cleansing, Anti-Pollution & Anti-Dirt Face Wash infused with Menthol for All Skin Types.
Experience crystal clear & refreshed skin with Saeed Ghani's Activated Charcoal Face Wash. The soft and creamy texture is infused with powerful activated charcoal beads that work wonders on your skin. Activated charcoal acts as a magnet, effortlessly trapping pollutants, toxins, dirt, and impurities, leaving your skin feeling deeply purified and refreshed after each use.
(100ml)
(50ml)

attributes.Benefits:
• Deeply cleans & naturally purifies skin.
• Reduces tan, brightens & evens skin tone.
• Cleanse dirt and toxins.
• Removes pollutants from the skin.
attributes.Directions: Wet your face and neck. Take a small amount of the face wash on your palm. Gently massage onto damp skin with fingertips for 1-2 minutes. Rinse with water. Pat dry. Enjoy cleaner, radiant skin.
attributes.Cautions: Perform a patch test prior to use. Discontinue if redness/irritation occurs.

(180gm)

This effective Saeed Ghani Goat milk moisturizing cleanser is available in a 180gm size and gives you the following benefits:
• Gently exfoliates your skin without causing any harm or dryness.
• Naturally balances the natural moisture on your skin for a smoother and radiant skin.
• Nourishes your skin and rehydrates it to pacify your sensitive skin.
attributes.Ingredients: Aqua, Cosmo Wax, Bees Wax, Glycerin, Goat Milk, Rose Water, Mineral Oil

attributes.What it is:
Reveal clear, radiant skin with our Acne Control & Pimple Clear Tea Tree & Neem Face Wash infused with Niacinamide.
Our revitalizing face wash cleans deeply and nurtures your skin with the natural antibacterial properties of tea tree and the calming touch of neem. Also infused with Niacinamide that enhances skin texture, reduces hyperpigmentation, and minimizes pores, offering a versatile solution for a brighter, smoother complexion with anti-inflammatory and antioxidant benefits. Experience a revitalizing and blemish-free cleanse which leaves your skin feeling refreshed and balanced. Make Tea Tree & Neem Face Wash part of your skincare ritual and transform your skin.
100ml

Reveal fresh, radiant skin with our brightening & nourishing Rice Face Wash, enriched with the goodness of rice extract, niacinamide, and vitamin E.
This gentle yet effective formula deeply cleanses, removing dirt, excess oil, and impurities without drying out your skin. Rice extract helps brighten and smooth your complexion, niacinamide evens out skin tone, and vitamin E provides deep nourishment and hydration.
Its lightweight, creamy texture creates a soft, rich lather that gently cleanses without stripping moisture. Perfect for daily use, the smooth, refreshing feel leaves your skin supple, hydrated, and glowing after every wash.
100ml
attributes.Benefits:
• Brightens & Evens Skin Tone – Rice extract and niacinamide help fade dark spots and enhance natural radiance.
• Deep Cleanses Without Drying – Removes dirt, oil, and impurities while keeping skin soft and hydrated.
• Nourishes & Revitalizes – Infused with Vitamin E to protect and refresh your skin.
• Smooth & Gentle Texture – A lightweight, creamy formula that glides effortlessly for a soothing cleanse.
• Suitable for All Skin Types – Gentle yet effective, perfect for daily use
attributes.How to use:
Step 1: Wet your face with lukewarm water.
Step 2: Take a small amount of Rice Face Wash and lather it in your hands.
Step 3: Gently massage onto your face in circular motions.
Step 4: Rinse thoroughly and pat dry.
Step 5: Follow with a moisturizer for best results.
Enjoy soft, hydrated, and glowing skin every day!

title: Glowing Ubtan Powder
description:
100 gm
Ubtan is a traditional herbal paste that’s made by mixing many essential ingredients including milk, gram flour, turmeric, Multani mud, and rose water in certain quantities.
Owing to the natural ingredients used in ubtan, we suggest you make it a permanent addition to your skincare routine.
Ubtan powder is conducive to younger, smoother skin. It helps in tightening up pores, removing dark circles, acne, and wrinkles.

attributes.Benefits:
An ubtan mask will get you the glow
Ubtan is a natural face mask and unlike other masks, it’s filled with loads of natural ingredients and goodness. When used twice or thrice a week consistently, it leaves the skin feeling clean and hydrated. As a result, you will get smooth skin. The milk used in the mask helps to lighten the dark spots on the skin that gives your skin a glow you have never experienced before.
Gives a flawless skin
Ubtan gives you a clear and flawless skin that you have always desired. Ubtan is your problem solver if you suffer from skin issues such as acne and pigmentation.
Anti-aging effect
Turmeric is famously known for its anti-inflammatory and anti-aging properties. All these properties make the skin appear youthful and bright. It is useful in treating flaky-dry skin, which is a big sign of aging.
Removes facial hair
Forget the artificial wax. A gentle facial scrub with Ubtan can help remove facial hair safely and gently.
Gives You Toned Skin
Multani mud powder is known to be amazing for your skin. It helps tighten and close your skin pores and simultaneously gives you a youthful glow that makes you look younger.

title: Pack of 2 Henna Powder Hair Dye Pouch
description:
Gone are the days of dry and dull hair with Saeed Ghani Pack Of 2 Henna Powder Hair Dye.
Make a thick paste with Henna powder and apply it evenly on the hair. Massage it onto the scalp and tips of hair then rinse off thoroughly. It makes your hair soft, deeply colorize it, and adds shine to it while making the hair thick and lustrous.
100 gm

Ubtan is a traditional herbal paste that’s made by mixing many essential ingredients including milk, gram flour, turmeric, Multani mud, and rose water in certain quantities.
Owing to the natural ingredients used in ubtan, we suggest you make it a permanent addition to your skincare routine.

An ubtan mask will get you the glow

When used twice or thrice a week consistently, it leaves the skin feeling clean and hydrated. As a result, you will get smooth skin. The milk used in the mask helps to lighten the dark spots on the skin that gives your skin a glow you have never experienced before.
Gives a flawless skin
Ubtan gives you a clear and flawless skin that you have always desired. Ubtan is your problem solver if you suffer from skin issues such as acne and pigmentation.
Anti-aging effect
Turmeric is famously known for its anti-inflammatory and anti-aging properties. All these properties make the skin appear youthful and bright. It is useful in treating flaky-dry skin, which is a big sign of aging.
Removes facial hair
Forget the artificial wax. A gentle facial scrub with Ubtan can help remove facial hair safely and gently.
Gives You Toned Skin
Multani mud powder is known to be amazing for your skin. It helps tighten and close your skin pores and simultaneously give you a youthful glow that makes you look younger.

attributes.WHAT IS IT:
Need a quick solution for fresh skin? Saeed Ghani organic rose water spray is just what you need. Made from fresh natural roses, our pure rose water is the perfect solution to help your skin fight pollution every day. It can help balance the natural oil that your skin produces and hydrate your skin to give you that young glow. Regular usage of our rose water for skin can help prevent wrinkles and fine lines.
(120ml)
Uses of rose water for glowing skin:
• Skin toner
• Acne fighter
• Pore cleanser
• Natural Makeup remover
• Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
• To reduce under-eye puffiness & keep the skin hydrated
The easy spray solution is perfect to help you take care of your skin on the go. Just take out the bottle and spray it on your face to unclog all the pores and purify your face of any bacteria.
For all skin types
attributes.BENEFITS:
Rose water as a Skin toner
Pure rose water is gentle in nature and helps in maintaining the skin's pH balance. It also possesses astringent properties which helps clean the pores of oil and grime toning the skin further. Regular use of rose water will keep the skin free of extra oil and help prevent problems like blackheads, whiteheads, acne and pimple. Using rose water as toner is better than using chemical-based toners which might dry out the skin.
Rose water has soothing properties and can be used as an all-natural skin toner. Apply rose water on your face and allow it to settle in your pores. Your face will feel fresh and the lingering rose aroma will uplift your mood.
Rose Water To reduce under-eye puffiness
Rose water helps to hydrate, revitalise and moisturise the skin giving it a refreshed look. Also, it has anti-inflammatory property which reduces redness in the skin. The gentle rose water can be used on the sensitive under-eye area without any worry. Puffy eyes will immediately perk up and look rejuvenated with a spray of rose water.
If your eyes are tired or puffy from lack of sleep, rose water offers a simple solution. Take a chill bottle of rose water (place the fridge for a while). Soak cotton pads in it and gently place on your eyelids. Keep on for as long as you want while enjoying the soothing feeling around your eyes. It will help reduce puffiness and give relief to tired eyes instantly.
Rose Water as Natural Makeup Remover
The soothing properties of rose water make it a gentle makeup remover for all skin types. When mixed with a natural oil, it can dissolve most of the makeup without being harsh on the skin. The skin will feel fresh and hydrated later and the sweet fragrance is an added advantage.
Rose water can help you get off that makeup in a gentle way. Mix 2 tsp of rose water with 1 tsp of coconut or almond oil to create an effective, natural makeup remover that will dissolve the most stubborn make-up with great care. Dip a cotton swab in this concoction and wipe away the layer of makeup and grime. Both rose water and coconut oil are good for skin and it is safe for removing eye makeup as well.
Rose Water as Natural Face Mist and Setting Spray
Keeping rose water handy in your bag can help you wipe off the sweat and dirt accumulated on the face while on the go. The best part is that it can be used in all seasons as it’s gentle on the skin and even hydrating. A quick spray of rose water on the face or sweaty skin will refresh it immediately and can be used as many times as required without worrying about the side effects or dryness in the skin.
A spritz of rose water on your face after a long day can be quite refreshing. It can also be used to set make-up and give a dewy finish.
Rose Water Hydrating the skin
One of the amazing benefits of rose water is that it can add a burst of moisture to the skin. The skin will feel cool, soft and soothed instantly. You can use it directly or mix rose water in your face mask, cream or lotion to add an extra dose of moisturisation to the skin.
Rose water gives a healthy glow to the skin and is good for boosting hydration. Mix a small amount of rose water in your moisturising cream and apply it on your face for a refreshing feel. The moisturiser will get easily absorbed in the skin hydrating it from within.

title: Hair Removal Cream (With Shea Butter)
description:
Saeed Ghani hair removal cream, enriched with Shea Butter, gives you silky-soft and smoother skin. Its special formula results in smoother & visibly brighter nourished skin. It has great moisturizing effects.
Patch test for new users:
If using for the first time, conduct a patch test by applying the product for 3 minutes on an area of your skin to check for any reactions.

attributes.Directions For Use:
• Read all precautions before use. Apply the cream evenly onto dry skin using an applicator/spatula, spreading a thick layer of cream evenly to fully cover the hair.
• Leave the cream on the skin for 3 minutes, and then remove a small amount of the cream with the help of the spatula to test a small area. If hair comes away easily, remove the rest of the cream with the spatula. If needed, leave the cream on for a few more minutes, without exceeding 10 minutes in total.
• Rinse your skin thoroughly with water after use and dry. Rinse the applicator, keep the tube tightly closed when not in use. Apply a small quantity of a moisturizing cream.

Mehndi can promote hair growth and our black mehndi can transform your hair, allowing you to restore your hair to its prime and even beyond! Our natural black henna utilizes non-harmful ingredients to make the hair stronger and silkier, giving you a youthful and gorgeous appearance.
10 gm

attributes.Benefits:
●Promotes hair growth
●Combats against dandruff and dry hair
●Can prevent premature grey hairs

attributes.What it is:
Ubtan is a traditional herbal paste that’s made by mixing many essential ingredients including milk, gram flour, turmeric, Multani mud, and rose water in certain quantities.
Owing to the natural ingredients used in ubtan, we suggest you make it a permanent addition to your skincare routine.
Ubtan powder is conducive to younger, smoother skin. It helps in tightening up pores, removing dark circles, acne, and wrinkles.
attributes.benefits:
An ubtan mask will get you the glow
Ubtan is a natural face mask and unlike other masks, it’s filled with loads of natural ingredients and goodness. When used twice or thrice a week consistently, it leaves the skin feeling clean and hydrated. As a result, you will get smooth skin. The milk used in the mask helps to lighten the dark spots on the skin that gives your skin a glow you have never experienced before.
Gives a flawless skin
Ubtan gives you a clear and flawless skin that you have always desired. Ubtan is your problem solver if you suffer from skin issues such as acne and pigmentation.
Anti-aging effect
Turmeric is famously known for its anti-inflammatory and anti-aging properties. All these properties make the skin appear youthful and bright. It is useful in treating flaky-dry skin, which is a big sign of aging.
Removes facial hair
Forget the artificial wax. A gentle facial scrub with Ubtan can help remove facial hair safely and gently.
Gives You Toned Skin
Multani mud powder is known to be amazing for your skin. It helps tighten and close your skin pores and simultaneously give you a youthful glow that makes you look younger.

attributes.Patch Test: We recommend a patch test before first use. Natural/Nature-based products can also cause allergic reactions to some skin types. Discontinue if redness/inflammation/irritation occurs. Avoid using on inflamed skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Store in a cool dark place.

title: Pack of 2 Henna Powder Hair Dye Pouch
description:
Gone are the days of dry and dull hair with Saeed Ghani Pack Of 2 Henna Powder Hair Dye.
Make a thick paste with Henna powder and apply it evenly on the hair. Massage it onto the scalp and tips of hair then rinse off thoroughly. It makes your hair soft, deeply colorize it, and adds shine to it while making the hair thick and lustrous.
100 gm

title: Zafrani Ubtan Pouch
description:
100 gm
Ubtan is a traditional herbal paste that’s made by mixing many essential ingredients including milk, gram flour, turmeric, Multani mud, and rose water in certain quantities.
The key ingredient in Zafrani Ubtan is Zafran that is a good anti-aging, anti-oxidant, and anti-inflammatory agent.
Owing to the natural ingredients used in ubtan, we suggest you make it a permanent addition to your skincare routine.
Zafran (Saffron) powder is conducive to younger, smoother skin. It helps in tightening up pores, removing dark circles, acne, and wrinkles.

This is followed by extremely subtle yet mesmerizing tones of blue lotus, lily-of-the-valley, and saffron, while simultaneously exuding a more musk-filled scent of Ceylon cinnamon, bourbon geranium, and mignonette. This unorthodox fragrance then closes off on a stronger note, giving off a scent composed of more masculine tobacco, musk, cedar, and sandalwood notes. This out of the box fragrance is tailored for men who want to stand out from the rest.

Incorporate rose oil for skin in daily routine:
The oil, known as the queen of all oils, is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Full of aptitudes, rose oil for skin enhances the beauty by making your skin more radiant, soft, and supple.
Nourish the skin cells:
The high concentration of vitamin A, B1, B2, and B3 Nourish the skin cells with permanent use, studies show that it improves skin elasticity by producing the right amount of collagen.
Can help control acne:
Acne, the worst skin problem of teenagers, tends to become more severe with pollution. Rose oil containing the antiseptic and astringent benefits helps reduce acne without any harsh peels and acids and gives your face instant glow making it more vibrant.
attributes.How To Use: Apply it directly to the skin or add a few drops to your shower gel, bath, or face cream for a hint of rose and hydration. Use it in a full body massage to reap the moisturizing benefits over your body

title: Onion Hair Growth Oil
description:
Onion Hair Oil is a nutrition rich oil that helps to control hair fall and scalp problems.
This hair oil helps to nourish your hair and scalp, and assist in transforming dull, lifeless and weak hair into strong, thick and voluminous hair. It is a non-sticky and non-greasy hair oil, making it fast-absorbing and easy to use.
Rich in flavonoids, sulphur - rich compounds and vitamins B, C, D, & E. Onion Oil helps strengthen strands, unclog blocked roots and protect against scalp infection.
For Daily use - Suits all hair type
140 ml

attributes.Benefits:
This hair oil helps to:
Tame Frizz
Reduce hair loss
Boosts gloss
Balance scalp condition
Repair hair damage caused by heat and chemical treatments.
attributes.How to use:
How to use:
Pump out a generous quantity of the oil depending on your hair volume and length. Gently massage onto scalp focusing on the roots, then work it through the length of your hair. Leave on for at-least half an hour before shampooing. For better results keep it overnight.
Lush hair tip:
For stimulating the roots and improve blood circulation, do a thorough scalp massage with the oil for few minutes. Wrap your hair in a towel for 15-20 minutes and then shampoo. Do this twice a week. It helps strengthen the strands.

Ultra Rich in Vitamin C, Calcium & Citric Acid content, Saeed Ghani’s Orange Peel Powder, is an effective exfoliating agent that helps in removing blackheads and unclogging your pores. It promotes the production of collagen and contains natural bleaching agents, which effectively brightens dull skin, evens the complexion and helps with skin elasticity and firmness. The naturally powerful properties of Orange Peel, helps regenerate the skin cells, protects your skin from sun damage and regulates sebum production, revealing a healthier, younger and more vibrant skin!
For cleansed, toned, and beautifully soft skin with a chemical-free natural skincare solution.
(25gm)
attributes.BENEFITS:
•
Exfoliates and improves skin texture
• Protects from & repairs sun damage
• Brightens the skin & evens the complexion
• Helps unclog pores and reduces blackheads
• Reduces pigmentation, acne, marks & spots on the skin
• Increases skin elasticity to reduce wrinkles and fine lines skin.
attributes.Directions:
Take two table spoons of Orange Peel Powder, mix it with Saeed Ghani rose water to make a paste. Apply and let the paste dry for 10 minutes. Rinse off with water. For dry skin, take small quantity of Orange Peel Powder, fresh milk, honey and Saeed Ghani rose water and make a mask, then apply on your face till dry. Wash your face and feel the difference. For effective results, use once-twice a week. Always patch test before use.
Recommended Additives for Specific Purpose:
Rose Water - To remove dark circles & acne.
Sandalwood Powder - For oily skin, to remove white heads, blackheads and excess oil.
Lemon - To remove tan and blemishes.
Milk - For brightness.
Honey - Nourishment & skin upliftment.
Multani Mud - To remove excess oil.
Apple - To reduce darkness
How To Use:
Mix Orange Peel Powder with a suitable addittive and make a smooth paste.
Ingredients:
Orange Peel Powder, Multani Mud Powder For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Store in a cool & dry place.
attributes.Patch Test: We recommend a patch test before first use. Natural/Nature-based products can also cause allergic reactions to some skin types. Discontinue if redness/inflammation/irritation occurs. Avoid using on inflamed skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Store in a cool dark place.

attributes.What it is:
Reveal your elegant and luxurious aura with our captivating women’s fragrance Sultana, a scent that embraces your unique beauty.
Saeed Ghani’s Sultana is a rich and delicate perfume that evokes unparalleled elegance. Opening with a symphony of top notes including ripe pear, succulent melon, creamy magnolia, velvety peach, zesty mandarin orange, and crisp bergamot, it immediately captivates with its freshness. The heart reveals an intoxicating blend of sensuous jasmine, dewy lily-of-the-valley, heady tuberose, and exotic orchid. Subtle hints of plum and violet add a nuanced sweetness to it. As the fragrance evolves, a seductive base features warm musk, smooth vanilla, subtle blackberry, and woody cedar.
Sultana is a timeless and unforgettable experience that leaves a trail of allure and sophistication wherever you go.
